lead_paragraph: DUGGAL--Baldev, Founder of Duggal Visual Solutions, who revolutionized the photography industry and served as its sustained force of innovation for over five decades, passed away peacefully in his sleep on June 29th, one month shy of his 79th birthday. Baldev Duggal was made of eternal optimism. He saw opportunity where others saw none. "If you don't have a dream, you have nothing," he often remarked. Baldev's dream was to leave the world better than he found it, and he went on to paint on a broader canvas. Baldev Duggal is survived by his three children: Susheila Kidman and husband Scott, Dave Duggal and wife Jennifer, Michael Duggal and wife Mollie. He is also survived by his eight grandchildren: Ryan, Brett and Lauren Kidman; Cyrus and Eloise Duggal; Faith, John Alexander and Christian Duggal; as well as his brother Sukhdev Duggal. A public memorial will be held on Wednesday, July 6th, 3:00pm at the Duggal Greenhouse located at 26 Navy Street (Building 268), Brooklyn, New York. 1/3
